style_guide.visual_style: Bright, cheerful animated illustration style with warm pastel colors (soft pinks, yellows, blues). Clean, friendly Korean webtoon-inspired aesthetic with gentle lighting. Casual, inviting mood that feels approachable and educational.
style_guide.segment_story: A friendly conversation between a young woman and a young man meeting for the first time at a cozy café. They sit across from each other at a small table with coffee cups, getting to know each other through introductory questions. The woman asks questions while the man responds warmly. The scene progresses from initial introductions (names, age) to discussing interests (hobbies) and compliments (about clothing), building toward a friendship invitation over coffee. The café setting has warm wooden tables, potted plants, and natural window lighting.
